title: 716ers Food
description: Featuring Buffalo NY-style fair like real Buffalo Wings, and fried crab sticks, this food truck is a must-have.  Coming out for their FOURTH Oak City Shred Fest, we have even converted them into shredding Squirrels.

title: Bolt Energy Drinks and Coffee
description: Featuring coffee drinks (lattes, espresso) and their featured one-of-a-kind signature BOLT energy drinks. Make sure and grab some delicious energy at this Oak City Stapple.

title: Raleigh Brewing Company
description: The Founding location of Oak City Onewheel and now a sponsor of Oak City Shred Fest.  Get a great local beer at one of the beer tents.
